'''Polished deepslate''' is the [[stone]]-like polished version of [[deepslate]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Polished deepslate can be obtained by mining it with a [[pickaxe]]. When mined using any other tool, it drops nothing.
{{breaking row|Polished Deepslate|Pickaxe|Wood|horizontal=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Polished deepslate generates naturally in [[ancient cities]].

== Usage ==

Using a stonecutter instead of a crafting table can produce all the derivative deepslate blocks directly. All of the blocks below, including polished deepslate, can also be obtained directly from [[Cobbled Deepslate|cobbled deepslate]].
